DISABLE_CHESS_TIMER: Timers cannot be activated if the chess timer is enabled. Do you want to disable the chess timer?
RESET_CONFIG_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to reset to default settings?
CONFIRM_NEXT_MATCH: Do you want to move to the next match?
CONFIRM_RESET_MATCHES: Do you want to reset the match counter?
IMAGE_SAVED_PROMPT: You have a saved image. What would you like to do?
